label: Avigdor Kahalani (Tat Aluf retired) chairman of the "Amal" profesional schools, who joned the Labour Party shortly after retiring from the IDF met with General Secretary of the labour Party Micha Harish that he is ready to give a hand and invest a lot of his time to promote the Party to the public.
